data.title: Fish and Shrimp Tacos
data.text: Excellent Taco's!!  All the ingredients were very fresh, the shrimp and fish were very hot and fresh. My order was to go and I got very quick service. The place was packed and Pacific Fish Grill did not disappoint!

data.title: taco tuesday is the best
data.text: good food on taco Tuesday..very crowded on this day...rest is menu is good....service is very slow...not enough staff is hired to serve customers

data.title: Great fish at reasonable prices!
data.text: My wife and I revisited Pacific Fish and Grill in the Downey (CA) Gateway, AND they still do fish well! My wife ordered the fish tacos without the zesty (read hot) sauce and said it was too mild. Well, you can't please everyone as when I've had the fish tacos before the sauce to me was HOT! Back to my own order: I went for the grilled Tilapia with veggies, pita bread, and that wonderful coleslaw. Unlike some other eateries, PF&G serves its coleslaw with raisins and pineapple slices; how sweet it is!!.For all that we had, it was just $20. The price and quality of food was well worth the visit!!!

data.title: Good
data.text: Have been a few times. Nice, clean, efficient. Parking can be a challenge during peak hours. Food is good and  satisfying.

data.title: Loved It Once But The Service Keeps Us From Returning
data.text: We originally went for Taco Tuesday and found the line outside the door.  The restaurant is quite compact, even with the outdoor seating.  If your order is called before a table is available, know the patrons before you have been rushed out of their seating.  Lingering during busy periods is frowned upon!  The food is quite good despite the increased prices for items deemed "upscale."  I made the mistake of ordering the most expensive item on the menu on their busiest day.  My party of 3 had to be split between 2 tables.  My co-diners received their food long before I did.  In fact, it took 50 minutes and many apologies from our server before my food was delivered--and the order was incorrect.  The entire meal was comped due to the huge miscommunication problem between the servers and the cooks.  We foolishly returned a few more times to watch the deterioration of customer service continue to the point of our no longer frequenting the Pacific Fish Grill.

data.title: Good variety, good value
data.text:
Son and girlfriend recommended the place. Went there on Sunday for dinner. 
Good variety, good value, 
Tried the fish tacos. Had a beer. Place was clean, servers were friendly and helpful, 
Will be there again!

data.title: Fish and Chips
data.text: Best fish and chips this side of London! The chips are great, and the black beans are good. The only thing missing was the mushy peas!

data.title: Dinner and Drinks
data.text: On a biz trip at Embassy Suites about 1 block away.  Meeting friends for dinner and drinks brought us here.   Enjoyed happy hour drinks, $3.75 and appetizers.  Then moved to entrees.  Entire experience was very nice.

data.title: "Love Taco Tuesday's ~ Kids eat Free Thursday"
data.text:
Ok, I love this place!!! The location and accessible parking in the surrounding areas. 
First, beautiful restaurant with TopA+ in cleanliness, service is super friendly, the beers are $2 during lunch happy hours and I have pictures to share. 
The best part about the experience is that the food is great, tortillas fresh, batter fish tacos are excellent and if you check in on Facebook you get 10% off tour check.... Thursday's your kids can eat free Fish &Chips so love it! A must have lunch on Tuesdays... If you want desert, Yogurtland is right across, situated on a cute little plaza in Downtown Downey.

data.title: Taco Tuesday Happy Hr a must
data.text: great happy hr.  Taco Tuesdays is so affordable and delicious... nice wine too.  very generous portions

data.title: First Timers - Positive Experience
data.text:
We ordered Red Snapper (fish eater) and chicken on a busy Friday night.  We also received a 10% discount for signing up for the newsletter/club.

Husband said his snapper tasted a little fishy.  However, my chicken skewer was grilled perfectly along with the rice pilaf I received.

Drinks are self-serve along with soda, teas and water.  There are a lot of spice options as well, including Sriacha.

Staff is friendly and helpful.  The restaurant is well kept and tables cleared as soon as guests are finished with their meals.  We enjoyed our visit and would return again.

data.title: Thursday bargain deal
data.text:
My grandkids spotted a yogurt place and wanted to stop, but we were actually looking for a lunch spot.  I saw this fish place as we walked by the yogurt shop and was drawn in by a sign that said children eat free on Thursday with the purchase of an adult entree and drink, one child per adult.  Hooray, healthy food and a bargain too.  I had the salmon plate with salad, grilled veggies and salad.  My husband enjoyed the tilapia plate with brown rice and salad.  Both entrees were delicious!  The grandkids enjoyed shrimp and fries.  I was pleasantly surprised that all three kids meals were free, a $20 savings!
We will be back to try even more offerings as everything we saw being served looked great.  Throughout our meal, several workers came by to make sure everything was okay.  One of the workers came to our table with an extra shrimp for each child because they were supposed to get six shrimp, not the five they received.  Who knew?  Certainly not us, so that was service!

data.title: Best Fish in Downey
data.text: This is a fun excellent restrauant.  Very helpful staff and fish quality fresh and well priced..No other place has the quality and priced fish in Downey.

data.title: Rolls without rice
data.text:
I applaud the chef for making rolls without all the rice wrappers. What an excellent idea to wrap a wonderful spicy ahi tuna with cucumber.
definitely coming back for this one, just wish the ambiance would be a bit more inviting.

data.title: Amazing Fish!
data.text: This place is the place to go for fish taco's. They have so much flavor and are nice and crispy! You can't go wrong with anything on their menu though. I love getting the salmon with the lemon sauce and their hummus with pita is a great snack or appetizer!

data.title: Fresh Seafood!
data.text: I came here during happy hour.  The happy hour menu had a lot of great choices.  I loved the zucchini, it had the perfect amount of batter. It was not thick and it was perfectly seasoned.  The shrimp skewer came with well seasoned plumped shrimp and grilled veggies.  The sauce that was on the skewer was just ok.  I prefer just a little bit of lemon and salt, but something I would defiantly order again.  The Mexiacan shrimp cocktail was delicious! Plenty of shrimp! I just added some lemon juice and tapatio. Definitely a place for lunch.

data.title: Great Seafood
data.text: My wife and I found this place after it opened.  We have gone several times. The food is delicious, reasonably priced and large portions. The service is quick. It is a nice restaurant. I would definitely recommend this place to anyone that visits Downey.

data.title: Family place
data.text: Good food at good prices. Simple decor. Clean and organized.  I love the Ceviche Tostada.  It's an appetizer but enough for me.

data.title: Great fish & chips....
data.text: This is a very low key place where you walk in order and take a seat. They are fast and friendly.. Another great local place..

data.title: My Gosh Delicious Fish
data.text: Terrific Fish Menu both Tasty Fried and Heart Healthy Grilled the outside patio is a must on a sunny day  great surroundings!!
